configuration:
yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs /data/yarn/nm-local
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle,spark_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.spark_shuffle.class org.apache.spark.network.yarn.YarnShuffleService
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.enabled true
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.rm-ids rm1,rm2
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.rm1 {{ groups.namenode.0 }}
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.rm2 {{ groups.namenode.1 }}
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address.rm1 {{ groups.namenode.0 }}:8088
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address.rm2 {{ groups.namenode.1 }}:8088
{% set zookeeper_connect = [] %} {% for hostname in groups.zookeeper %} {{ zookeeper_connect.append(hostname + ':' + zookeeper_client_port) }} {% endfor %}
yarn.resourcemanager.zk-address {{ zookeeper_connect | join(',') }}
yarn.resourcemanager.cluster-id yarn-cluster
yarn.application.classpath
$HADOOP_CONF_DIR, {{ stack_root }}/hadoop/*, {{ stack_root }}/hadoop/lib/*, {{ stack_root }}/hadoop/share/hadoop/client/*, {{ stack_root }}/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/*, {{ stack_root }}/hadoop/share/hadoop/yarn/lib/*
